summary: Continuation of the mod Tamriel Reloaded now covering interiors. Sewers, mines, prisons, ratway, etc... are now covered by this mod.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57703-1-1409492514.jpg[/img]
Continuation of the mod Tamriel Reloaded now covering interiors. Sewers, mines, prisons, ratway, forts... are now covered by this mod. Some of textures are used too in exteriors, so for better look I recommend to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46925/?]Tamriel reloaded[/url]. Other interiors like nordic and dwemer ruins are covered in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46925/?]Tamriel Reloaded[/url] but i will probably improve them here (i already did).

As i did with Tamriel Reloaded i did this for myself but i decided to share it, so its a WIP since while i play Skyrim i continue making changes.

[center][youtube]Cz6exzzrr0Q[/youtube][youtube]bL57tVFZPJ4[/youtube][youtube]twP_oXb2Sw4[/youtube][youtube]Laj0R3HLEV8[/youtube][/center]

[size=6][b][color=orange]INSTALLATION[/color][/b][/size]
[size=4][b][color=red]1[/color][/b][/size]- Download Tamriel Reloaded Interiors and install via NMM or copying content into Skyrim/data folder and click "yes" when prompted.
[size=4][b][color=red]2[/color][/b][/size]- If you want to use any optional file, chose the file and install it in same way that main file.


[size=4][b][color=red]Updates:[/color][/b][/size]

-7-8-14- Added optional Ratway files to make it look more wet.
[url=http://imgur.com/Od55qUk][img]http://i.imgur.com/Od55qUks.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://imgur.com/f1ntq8k][img]http://i.imgur.com/f1ntq8ks.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://imgur.com/ytbPfCo][img]http://i.imgur.com/ytbPfCos.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://imgur.com/2UfYfxs][img]http://i.imgur.com/2UfYfxss.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=6][b][color=orange]COMPATIBILITY[/color][/b][/size]
Since is a texture mod is compatible with anything but can cause weird textures if mixtured with other texture mods.

[size=6][b][color=orange]PERFORMANCE[/color][/b][/size]
I made a 1k version but i dont think is really needed for interiors unless you have a PC from 1928.

[size=6][b][color=orange]RECOMMENDED MODS[/color][/b][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46925/?]Tamriel Reloaded[/url] (install first)
ELFX, RLO or any lighting mod
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]SMIM[/url]

[size=4][b][color=red]Differences with Tamriel Reloaded[/color][/b][/size]
From now i will work in all interiors in this mod. Atm Dwemer ruins got new textures and overall interiors some fixed textures.

Some screens:
